creator: steve_l@iseran.com
text:
These are just javadoc warnings, saying it cant find some dependent libraries 
in the optional tasks; everything built just fine, probably. 

If you are going to build ant, get as many dependentlibraries as you can 
manage first, otherwise most of the optional tasks will be missing.
